DemoCharacter.name: Dimitri
DemoCharacter.description:
<c=f5d130>Dimitri</c>
This is russian hacker. I have kat named <c=boldPink>Boris</c>

BookOfTails.name: FREE MONEY
BookOfTails.description: At start of turn,gain an energy and add a <c=cardtrait>temp</c> <c=card>Annoying PopUp</c> to your hand.

Counting.name: Unknown Bug
Counting.description: At start of turn, stare at the screen looking for the error. Once you counted 3 turns, gain 1 <c=status>BACKWARDS MISSILE</c> and start counting again.

description.None: IT ALLOWS YOU TO DRAW 2 CARDS FROM YOUR DECK.
Create a ChugJug in your hand.
description.A: Create 2 ChugJug in your draw pile.
description.B: Create a Default Emote and a Chug Jug in your hand.

AutododgeLeftNextTurn.name: Autododge Left Next Turn
AutododgeLeftNextTurn.description: At the start of next turn, gain <c=boldPink>{0}</c> <c=status>AUTODODGE LEFT</c>.

BackwardsMissiles.name: Permanent Backwards Missile 'Boost'
BackwardsMissiles.description: At the start of every turn, gain <c=boldYellow>{0}</c> <c=status>BACKWARDS MISSILES</c>.
